meanings: (일·어려움 등을) experience, undergo, (시련 등을) suffer, go through, meet with

vlive.korean: 그런 거 겪어보신 적 있으세요? Have you experienced that before? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 유턍 깜찍함에 양손으로 앞통수 뒷통수 치고나면 눈앞에 별이 디리리리링💫 (TAEYANG talking about his contents)
사랑이라는 테마 안에서 누구나 겪을 수 있는 감정... It's about emotions you would feel when you love someone. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [FULL] NU'EST 일곱 번째 미니앨범 'The Table' 발매 기념 쇼케이스
vlive.english: It's about emotions you would feel when you love someone.

vlive.korean: 내가 겪어본 상황이 아니라 뭔가 함부로 말하면 안 될 것 같은 느낌? but I haven't had the same experience. I'm very cautious. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 힘든 친구를 위로하는 최고의 방법 [다만너] - EP.07
vlive.english: but I haven't had the same experience. I'm very cautious.

vlive.korean: 왜 아픔을 겪었어요? Why did you suffer? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [DAY6] 새벽 다섯시의 삼겹살 7인분,, 일단 다이나믹하게 돌리고~ 돌리고~(੭ ᐕ)੭*⁾⁾🥩(Jae&Young K’s Pork belly episode)
[슬럼프를 겪어본 적이 있다!] [I have been in a slump!] View video V TODAY VIETNAM OFFICIAL : [Exclusive] Chung Ha muốn gặp lại người bạn Việt Nam và ăn món bò lá lốt

examples.korean: We became companions in misfortune. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 불행을 겪으며 동지가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We became companions in misfortune. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She experienced considerable hardships during her childhood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 유년기에 상당한 고생을 겪으며 살아왔다. Neungyule
examples.english: She experienced considerable hardships during her childhood. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The orphan brought up with his blood and guts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 고아는 모진 고통과 쓰라림을 겪으며 양육되었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The orphan brought up with his blood and guts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We all live our lives experiencing all sorts of emotions. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람은 누구나 희로애락을 겪으며 살아간다 Neungyule
examples.english: We all live our lives experiencing all sorts of emotions. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They may also have trouble concentrating and remembering things. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이들은 또한 집중을 하는데 어려움을 겪으며 기억을 잘하지 못할 수 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: They may also have trouble concentrating and remembering things. Add to Wordbook
